summary: A monstrously powerful conjurer that hunts you down relentlessly. Y'know, if you're into that sort of thing.
descriptionHtml:
Back in Oblivion, there was a bit of paid DLC called 'Spell Tomes'. This DLC added a number of extra magical spells to the game, but it also added another thing. One NPC, a conjurer, would spawn and hunt you down, no matter where you were. At the bottom of an enormous dungeon, the middle of a crowded city, locked up in a high-security stronghold... He would find you, and if you were unprepared, he would murder you. Terrifying.

Now, i have brought that same character back, except... I've done what I could to distill that feeling of terror i got when he finally found me. This guy is brutally strong, and has no reason to wait for you to prepare yourself before he sets a dremora lord on you.

For best effect, activate this mod once your character has levelled up a bit and gotten some decent gear.

Oh, and he respawns. I feel like I should warn you about that.
You can run, but you can't hide.

Hircine would be proud.
author: LyleDrake
